IC.AST
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  IC.AST.Environment

public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a state during the evaluation of a program.

get

public java.lang.Integer get(Location l)
Retrieves the value of the given variable. If the variable has not been initialized an exception is thrown.
